thread.title: Alabama Smothers Clemson to Advance to Title Game

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Alabama Smothers Clemson to Advance to Title Game
text:
NEW ORLEANS—Last year, Clemson went on a mission even bolder than trying to beat Alabama in the national championship: Forcing the No. 1 team in the country—which had defeated Clemson for the title a year earlier—to play a completely foreign type of football.
That is, fast. They wanted to prevent Alabama from playing like Alabama.
Dabo Swinney... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
